channel.title: My quest is done?
channel.description: Okay I need some help When people log in the quests are already done how do i change this?

item.title: My quest is done?
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“noobspure50, post:1, topic:273731”]Okay I need some help When people log in the quests are already done how do i change this?[/quote]You could just add a ::quests command, and in the welcome message say
Also for all quests complete do ::quests, or on the quests tab it could say Do ::quests like mine does,

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("quests")) { q1 = 15; q2 = 15; q3 = 15; q4 = 15; q5 = 15; q6 = 15; q7 = 15; q8 = 15; q9 = 15; q10 = 15; q11 = 15; sendQuest("@gre@Lost City", 7332); sendQuest("@gre@Rune Mysteries", 7333); sendQuest("@gre@Desert Treasure", 7334); sendQuest("@gre@Vampire Slayer", 7336); sendQuest("@gre@Monkey Madness", 7383); sendQuest("@gre@Sheep Shearer", 7339); sendQuest("@gre@Legends Quest", 7338); sendQuest("@gre@Lunar Diplomacy", 7340); sendQuest("@gre@Knight's Legend", 7346); sendQuest("@gre@Lunar Spirit", 7341); sendQuest("@gre@The Wolf's Cure", 7342); }

Read full topic
